title: ConvergePoint Announces Compliance Management Solution is Now Available as Software-as-a-Service (Saas)
text:
ConvergePoint Announces Compliance Management Solution is Now Available as Software-as-a-Service (Saas)
Houston, TX, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- ConvergePoint, a leading provider of regulatory compliance management software announces their enterprise Policy Management, Contract Management and Conflict of Interest software solutions are now available as Software-as-a-Service.
“Our new Software-as-a-Service implementation makes it simple for customers who are considering a new compliance management software system to move their documents to the cloud, while leveraging the security and reliability Microsoft’s Azure Cloud platform has to offer,” said ConvergePoint’s Chief Technology Architect, Aju Koshy.
There are now three different options for deploying ConvergePoint’s regulatory compliance management solution - internally on an existing SharePoint platform, externally on dedicated servers via Office 365 and now as Software-as-a-Service (SaaS).
ConvergePoint’s compliance software solution offers an effective and simple way to manage even the most business critical and sensitive compliance documents. With workflow builders, version control, audit trails, keyword search, custom data fields, dashboards, reporting, and more, ConvergePoint streamlines the entire document management process throughout life-cycle.
About:
ConvergePoint, the leading compliance management solution provider on Microsoft SharePoint, boasts five full-featured software products for the complete management of Policies and Procedures, Contracts, Conflict of Interest Disclosures, Incident Tracking and Employee Training. ConvergePoint’s Policy Management Software, Contract Management Software, Conflict of Interest Software and Safety Software provides industry best practices and U.S. based support.
Visit http://www.convergepoint.com/ to learn more.
